product_name: REI Sahara Long-Sleeve Shirt - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: The women's REI Sahara Long-Sleeve Shirt in plus sizes provides comfort, ventilation and adjustable coverage for hiking in warm climates. Lightweight polyester fabric wicks moisture and stretches comfortably. Fabric also offers UPF 50+ protection; sun collar folds up to extend your coverage. Sun cuffs unfold to extend coverage over backs of hands; sleeves can also be rolled up and secured with button tabs. Shirt has 1 large mesh-lined vent at the back yoke, plus a zippered, mesh-lined vent on each side seam; 2 zippered vents on the chest double as shallow mesh pockets. Zip document pocket is hidden under the front placket. Front of shirt also has a handy sunglasses loop by one of the chest vents. Seam-free shoulder design prevents abrasion under pack straps. The women's REI Sahara Long-Sleeve Shirt in plus sizes has a relaxed fit that allows for comfort and movement.
short_description: The women's REI Sahara Long-Sleeve Shirt in plus sizes provides comfort, ventilation and adjustable coverage for hiking in warm climates.
